sentences.en: A scepter is the attribute of power.
Childhood had less freedom and joy than we sentimentally attribute to it.
sentences.cn: 童年并非像我们现在一厢情愿所认为的那样自在快乐。

sentences.en: Cruelty is a normal attribute of human behaviour.
For the idea of a perfect being does not involve the attribute.
sentences.cn: 因为“完美无缺的存在”这一概念并未涉及其属性.

sentences.en: He has every attribute you could want and could play for any team.
sentences.cn: 他具备你想要的所有品质，放在哪个队都行。

sentences.en: I attribute our success to him.
sentences.cn: 我把我们的成功归功于他.

sentences.en: It is possible to attribute a useful mathematical meaning to U ( x, W ).
sentences.cn: 赋予U ( x, W ) 一种有用的数学意义是可能的.

sentences.en: It is preposterous to attribute to mere external conditions.
sentences.cn: 仅仅以外部环境解释一切是不合理的.

sentences.en: Most historians attribute such declines to wars and conquests.
sentences.cn: 大多数的历史学家把这样的衰亡归于战争和征服.

sentences.en: People were beginning to attribute superhuman qualities to him.
sentences.cn: 人们开始觉得他超人一等。

sentences.en: Politeness is an attribute of a gentleman.
sentences.cn: 彬彬有礼是绅士的本色.

sentences.en: She attributes her success to hard work and a little luck.
sentences.cn: 她认为她的成功来自勤劳和一点运气。

sentences.en: The crown is an attribute of kingship.
The pious Sweater would attribute it to idleness or incapacity.
sentences.cn: 这位虔诚的斯韦特就会把原因归之于懒惰成性或者缺乏才能.

sentences.en: We can attribute this to the three dimensional nature of the problem.
sentences.cn: 我们把此归结为问题的三维本性.

sentences.en: What attributes should a good manager possess?
sentences.cn: 一名优秀的经理应该具备哪些素质？

sentences.en: Women tend to attribute their success to external causes such as luck.
sentences.cn: 女性倾向于将她们的成功归因于外部因素，比如运气。

trans.tran_en: a quality or feature, especially one that is considered to be good or useful
If you attribute something to an event or situation, you think that it was caused by that event or situation
If you attribute something to an event or situation, you think that it was caused by that event or situation
